projects.title: LocaleX
projects.tagline: Professional Localization Tool for iOS & macOS
projects.description: Streamline your localization workflow with AI-powered translations, smart project management, and native Xcode integration. Translate your apps to 130+ languages in minutes.

fullDescription.intro: Localize your iOS and macOS apps in minutes, not hours. LocaleX is a powerful native macOS application that streamlines your localization workflow with AI-powered translations, smart project management, and an intuitive interface.

keyFeatures.title: üåç Multi-Language Support
keyFeatures.description: Support 130+ languages with intelligent market recommendations. See potential reach metrics for each language and make data-driven decisions about which markets to target.

keyFeatures.title: ü§ñ AI-Powered Translation
keyFeatures.description: Leverage Claude, ChatGPT, or Gemini to translate your entire app instantly. Context-aware translations that understand your app's purpose and maintain consistency across all strings.

keyFeatures.title: üìÅ Native Xcode Integration
keyFeatures.description: Works seamlessly with .xcstrings and .strings files. Direct integration with your Xcode projects - no export/import needed. Changes sync automatically with your codebase.

keyFeatures.title: üéØ Smart Translation Memory
keyFeatures.description: Never translate the same string twice. LocaleX learns from your translation history and suggests previously used translations for consistency.

keyFeatures.title: üìö Custom Glossary
keyFeatures.description: Define your brand-specific terms, product names, and non-translatable words. Ensure consistent terminology across all languages.

keyFeatures.title: üíé Quality Assurance
keyFeatures.description: Built-in proofreading helps catch context issues, tone inconsistencies, and translation errors before they reach production.

keyFeatures.title: ‚ö° Blazing Fast Workflow
keyFeatures.description: Bulk translation operations, keyboard shortcuts, and an intuitive interface designed specifically for developers. Translate hundreds of keys in seconds.

keyFeatures.title: üîí Privacy First
keyFeatures.description: Use your own API keys - we never see your content or translations. All processing happens through your own AI provider accounts.

features: Use your own API key (OpenAI, Anthropic, or Google)
No hidden costs or usage limits

perfectFor: Solo iOS/macOS developers launching international apps
Development teams managing multiple localized projects
Anyone tired of manual translation management
technicalSpecs: Support for Xcode .xcstrings and legacy .strings files
Project context awareness for better translations
fullDescription.quote: Traditional localization is tedious and expensive. LocaleX makes it fast and affordable by letting you use AI with your own API keys. Set up your project once, and translate to 50+ languages in minutes.
gettingStarted: Open your Xcode project in LocaleX
Add target languages from our curated list
Configure your AI provider API key
Hit "Translate All" and watch the magic happen
Review, refine, and export back to Xcode
